title: Mila Kunis wants to be a Real Housewife, Ashton Kutcher's not happy
text:
Mila Kunis might not be a Real Housewife anytime soon if Ashton Kutcher has his way (Picture: Getty/REX)

Mila Kunis wants to make a big career change – starring on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. The only problem? Husband Ashton Kutcher would ‘kill her’.

The Family Guy actress revealed that she asked her That 70s Show co-star on his feelings if she joined the hit Bravo TV series.

Kunis appeared on comedy actress Andrea Savage’s podcast A Grown-Up Woman, and shared that Kutcher’s response was less than ideal.

Could you see Mila taking her place in this line-up? (Picture: WireImage)

‘I’m a big Real Housewives of Beverly Hills fan,’ she shared. ‘I did ask my husband once: “Listen, later in like 20, 30 years, what do you think of me going on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills? Just for like a year.” He goes, “I would kill you.”‘

Kunis even revealed that she had once glimpsed the Real Housewives in the flesh when they were all on a flight together.

‘They were behind me,’ she said. ‘And I was like, “Oh my God, it’s the people from this reality show!” I was so excited.’

The reality TV loving couple have spoken openly aout their love for The Bachelor and The Bachelorette (Picture: Instagram)

However, even if the couple won’t be making an appearance on reality TV anytime soon, that doesn’t mean that they can’t enjoy their fix at the end of a long day.

‘Monday nights for us are… White wine, vodka tonic and turn on The Bachelor or The Bachelorette,’ Kutcher previously shared.

The couple even appeared on their favourite show in 2017 to help the Bachelorette find her perfect man.

It’s also been a notable week for the couple, as Kutcher is caught up in Demi Moore’s allegations that he cheated on her when they were married.
